name: Deepakkumar Shanmugasundaram
title: Full-Stack Developer | AI & Automation Enthusiast

contact.location: 1620 Chicory Lane, Celina, TX 75009 (Willing to Relocate)

about: Full-Stack Developer and AI/Automation Enthusiast with 4+ years of experience designing and developing scalable web and mobile applications. Proficient in React, Java Spring Boot, Python, and cross-platform mobile development (Flutter/React Native), with hands-on expertise in CI/CD pipelines, AWS cloud deployment, and DevOps practices. Skilled in building AI-powered solutions, including NLP pipelines, RPA workflows, and GenAI-driven automation systems. Adept at delivering secure, user-centric platforms, optimizing system performance, and integrating AR/VR and advanced automation technologies. Actively seeking roles as a Full-Stack Developer, DevOps Engineer, GenAI Engineer, or RPA Automation Specialist to contribute to innovative, high-impact projects.

skills.name: Java & Spring Boot
skills.details: Built backend microservices, API-driven processing and deployed modular architecture using Spring Boot. Implemented unit tests, CI/CD and performance tuning.

skills.name: React.js & Frontend
skills.details: Developed responsive loan application and CMS platforms, and polished UI/UX with React, Tailwind and Bootstrap.

skills.name: Python, NLP & Automation
skills.details: Built automation workflows with Selenium and Python; used spaCy and TensorFlow for document classification and extraction.

skills.name: AWS & DevOps
skills.details: Integrated S3, EC2, Lambda, IAM; automated builds and deployments via GitHub Actions; containerized apps with Docker.

skills.name: Databases
skills.details: Worked with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL and Oracle DB; designed schemas and optimized queries.

skills.name: Mobile & Cross-Platform
skills.details: Built Flutter/React Native apps, integrated backend APIs and implemented E2E testing with Appium.

details: Developed a responsive loan application and CMS platform using React, enhancing user experience, improving data intake, and increasing client engagement with real-time content updates.
Integrated AWS services including S3 (data storage), IAM (role-based access), and EC2 (deployment), while automating builds and deployments via GitHub Actions.
Built and maintained scalable backend microservices with Java Spring Boot, supporting modular architecture and API-driven data processing.
Implemented test automation using Selenium, achieving over 90% test accuracy, and continuously optimized system performance through CI/CD pipelines and code versioning best practices.

Designed and deployed intelligent web automation workflows using Python and Selenium to extract, transform, and analyze structured/unstructured data across multiple sources, enhancing operational efficiency.
Applied Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques using spaCy and TensorFlow to classify, extract, and contextualize data from loan documents, increasing data accuracy by 40%.
Troubleshot and resolved complex full-stack application issues, ensuring high availability and performance.

Developed a cross-platform ACMS and CRM mobile application using Flutter and React Native, with secure login and user data management, ensuring high performance and consistency across Android and web platforms.
Built a React-based web application with structure and performance aligned to the mobile app, using Selenium for web automation testing and Appium for mobile automation validation.
Integrated VR/AR modules using location-based services to suggest nearby attractions (airports, museums, etc.), enhancing user interaction and increasing app engagement.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using AWS services (S3, EC2, Lambda, IAM), with backend support in Java Spring Boot and Python.
Developed backend services handling RESTful APIs, automation workflows, and AR/VR business logic.
Optimized databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) and application performance using caching, lazy loading, and efficient API endpoints.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and deliver high-quality software on time.
Ensured security and compliance through encryption, authentication, and best practices for user data management.

experience.company: KS Smart Solutions Pvt Ltd, Chennai, India
details: Designed and developed user interfaces with Flutter to create visually appealing and intuitive mobile apps.
Built cross-platform applications for iOS and Android ensuring consistent functionality and design.
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate APIs and ensure smooth data flow between frontend and backend.
Connected apps to external APIs and services to enhance functionality.
Optimized performance across devices by fine-tuning code and resources.
Conducted extensive testing and debugging to ensure reliable functionality.
Used Git for version control to manage code and collaborate with teams.
Stayed updated with Flutter and mobile development trends, implementing best practices.
Deployed apps to app stores, monitored performance, and released updates.
Implemented security features including encryption, authentication, and user data protection.

projects.name: Virtual Try-On Dress Technology (AVITON)
description: Real-time AI-powered virtual try-on system allowing users to preview dresses and outfits before purchase
Body pose and edge detection using MediaPipe and OpenCV for precise alignment of garments
Garment warping with Thin Plate Spline (TPS) transformations to adapt clothing naturally to body posture
Texture preservation and realistic blending ensuring fabric folds and patterns remain visible
Unity integration for immersive AR/VR-based online shopping experience
TensorFlow models optimized garment fitting and image-to-image transformations
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) integrated with NLP to recommend outfit combinations and styles from a curated fashion dataset
NLP-driven personalization enabled users to query outfits in natural language (e.g., 'show me summer dresses' or 'recommend a formal outfit')
Improved over traditional try-on systems by combining visual try-on with intelligent recommendation capabilities
Occlusion handling for realistic overlays when body parts (like arms) overlap clothing

projects.name: Predictive Modeling for Cancer Patient Dataset
description: Developed a supervised machine learning model using Scikit-learn to predict cancer patient survival
Performed exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and hyperparameter tuning
Implemented cross-validation to improve model accuracy and robustness
Deployed the predictive model on AWS for scalability

projects.name: Smart Women IoT Governance System
description: Designed an IoT-based safety system to protect women and children from harassment
Developed a smart belt to monitor movement and detect forced pulls
Connected the device to a mobile app via Bluetooth with background monitoring
Triggered alarms and sent real-time location data during emergencies

projects.name: Smart Water Management System Using IoT
description: Developed a system to monitor and manage underground water pipelines
Used sensors to detect water leakage and transmit exact pipe locations
Enabled real-time monitoring of water flow and usage in individual homes
Generated automated water usage bills based on consumption

projects.name: Accident Prevention and Detection System Using IoT
description: Built an IoT-based system to prevent and detect vehicle accidents
Integrated RF module and ABS brake system in four-wheelers
Implemented messaging system to alert moving vehicles about resting vehicles
Enabled automatic ABS braking to prevent collisions
Sent real-time accident alerts to ambulances via GSM or RF

projects.name: KNN-based Threat Detection and Gas Live Monitoring System
description: Developed a home security and gas monitoring system using IoT
Integrated voice recognition module to detect emergency keywords
Triggered alerts to neighbors and police stations during emergencies
Implemented gas leak detection module connected to ThinkSpeak server
Enabled real-time data visualization and monitoring

certificates.name: Oracle Gen AI Architect
certificates.details: Specialization in designing GenAI-driven enterprise architectures.
